devnotes-patch-1.0.title: DevNotes patch 1.0
devnotes-patch-1.0.new_features:
-Add the button to change the information between global and Chinese: Now wanderers will be able to see and navigate each character with both global and Chinese data. 
-Add dev note section: I will constantly be changing, adding and removing things, so this is a kind of communication that I will have with you. 
-I modified and plan to change and remodel the entire 'character details' view so stay tuned.
